survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from participants of online fitness classes to understand their satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in online fitness classes?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the options cover a broad range of participation frequencies to capture diverse user behaviors.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in online fitness classes?

questions.question_text: Which types of online fitness classes do you typically attend? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture classes not listed. Ensure mobile-friendly design for multi-select.

script.question_text: Which types of online fitness classes do you typically attend? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you choose online fitness classes over in-person classes?
answer_options: Ability to workout at my own pace
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique reasons. Ensure readability.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you choose online fitness classes over in-person classes?
answer_options: Ability to workout at my own pace

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of instruction in the online fitness classes you attend?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of instruction in the online fitness classes you attend?

questions.question_text: What devices do you typically use to access online fitness classes? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture devices not listed. Ensure mobile-friendly design for multi-select.

script.question_text: What devices do you typically use to access online fitness classes? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the technical performance (e.g., video quality, audio clarity) of the online fitness classes you attend?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard rating scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How would you rate the technical performance (e.g., video quality, audio clarity) of the online fitness classes you attend?

questions.question_text: What features would you like to see added to online fitness classes? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique suggestions. Ensure mobile-friendly design for multi-select.

script.question_text: What features would you like to see added to online fitness classes? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the online fitness classes you attend to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the online fitness classes you attend to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when participating in online fitness classes?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique challenges. Ensure readability.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when participating in online fitness classes?

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving online fitness classes?
questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to provide open-ended feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving online fitness classes?
